text: Isabelle Christine Lourenço Gomes Drummond (born April 12, 1994) is a Brazilian actress. She began her career in 2000 in the telenovela Laços De Família and gained recognition in 2001 where she played Emília in the children's sitcom Sítio Do Pica-Pau Amarelo. and later acted in telenovelas Eterna Magia, A Favorita, Caras & Bocas, Cheias de Charme, Sangue Bom and Geração Brasil. Isabelle dated singer Tiago Iorc. Drummond was born in Niterói in Rio de Janeiro. == Filmography == Films & TV Year Title Role Notes 2000 Xuxa Popstar Ju Movie Laços de Família little girl in the Pet Shop Episode: June 7 Linha Direta Bento's daughter Episode: "O.T.A./ Franca" 2001 Os Maias Rosicler Maia 2001–2006 Sítio do Pica-Pau Amarelo Emília 2005 A História de Rosa Rosa 2007 Eterna Magia Angelina Ferreira O'Neill (Gina) 2008 A Favorita Carla Episode: August 30th 2009 Caras & Bocas Bianca Conti Se Eu Fosse Você 2 Bia Movie Super Chefinhos Self (contest) Season 1 2011 Cordel Encantado Rosa Alfredo 2012 Cheias de Charme Maria Aparecida dos Santos Souza (Cida) Rise Of The Guardians Tooth Fairy Dubbing 2013 Sangue Bom Giane de Souza 2014 Geração Brasil Megan Lily Parker Marra Amazônia - Planeta Verde Gaia Dubbing 2015 Sete Vidas Júlia de Moraes Brandão As Aventuras do Pequeno Colombo Mab Dubbing 2016 A Lei do Amor young Heloísa Martins (Helô) Episode: October 03 to 07 2017 Novo Mundo Anna Millman 2018 Talvez Uma História de Amor Cíntia Movie 2019 Verão 90 Manuela Renata Andrade (Manuzita) 2021 Turma da Mônica: Lições Tina Movie As Crianças Que Amamos Self Episode: "Isabelle Drummond" 2022 Minha Família Perfeita Denise Movie == References == == Other websites == * Category:People from Niterói Category:Brazilian actors
